Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal

Class RecoveredEditsOutputSink

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.OutputSink
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.AbstractRecoveredEditsOutputSink
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.RecoveredEditsOutputSink
@Private class RecoveredEditsOutputSink extends AbstractRecoveredEditsOutputSink
Class that manages the output streams from the log splitting process. Every region only has one recovered edits file PER split WAL (if we split multiple WALs during a log-splitting session, on open, a Region may have multiple recovered.edits files to replay -- one per split WAL).
See Also:
  • which is like this class but imposes upper bound on the number of writers active at one time (makes for better throughput).

      Get a writer and path for a log starting at the given entry. This function is threadsafe so long as multiple threads are always acting on different regions.
      Returns:
      null if this region shouldn't output any logs
